title: User Signup with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user (agent or client) can successfully sign up with valid registration details passing all Zod validations.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Input valid user information adhering to all form fields and validation rules
Submit the signup form
Verify user account is created and redirected to the appropriate landing page
Check confirmation email or welcome message is present

title: User Signup with Invalid Data
description: Verify the signup form prevents submission and shows validation errors when provided with invalid or incomplete data.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Input invalid/partial user data (e.g., missing required fields, invalid email format)
Attempt to submit the signup form
Verify that the form is not submitted and appropriate validation messages are displayed inline

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that users can login successfully using valid credentials.

steps.description: Open the login page
Enter registered email and correct password
Click the login button
Confirm successful login status and redirection to user dashboard

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Ensure the application handles incorrect login attempts and displays appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter registered email and incorrect password
Click login button
Verify login failure with displayed error message indicating invalid credentials

title: Password Recovery Flow
description: Verify that users can initiate a password reset request and receive password recovery instructions.

steps.description: Navigate to the forgot password page
Input registered email address
Submit the password recovery form
Verify the system displays a confirmation that password reset instructions were sent

title: CRUD Operations for Property Management
description: Test the creation, retrieval, update, and deletion of property listings by agents, including form validations and UI updates.

steps.description: Login as an agent and navigate to the Properties section
Create a new property with valid details
Confirm the property appears in the list with correct details
Edit the property details and save changes
Verify updated details are reflected correctly
Delete the property
Ensure property is removed from the list and database

title: Property Filtering and Search Functionality
description: Validate that property filtering and search return accurate, relevant, and responsive results based on multiple criteria.

steps.description: Navigate to properties listing page
Apply various filters like price range, location, property type, and status
Verify that the listed properties match filter criteria correctly
Input search keywords and submit
Confirm results accurately match search terms
Clear filters and search
Verify entire property list is displayed again

title: Client Favorite Properties Management
description: Check that clients can add and remove properties from their favorites and that favorites persist across sessions.

steps.description: Login as a client and browse available properties
Add a property to favorites
Confirm the property is marked as favorite and listed in favorites section
Remove the property from favorites
Verify the property is no longer in the favorites list
Logout and login again
Check that favorites reflect previous state accurately

title: Client-Agent Communication via Contact Interface
description: Verify that clients can send messages to agents through the interface and messages are received and displayed correctly.

steps.description: Login as a client and navigate to a property's agent contact form
Compose and send a message to the agent
Verify message is sent successfully and confirmed in UI
Login as the corresponding agent
Check the message is received and viewable in client communications

title: Agent Profile and Dashboard Analytics Display
description: Ensure agent profiles load correctly and dashboard displays accurate statistics, reminders, and charts with Chart.js and Recharts.

steps.description: Login as an agent
Navigate to the profile and dashboard pages
Validate the profile displays correct personal and agency information
Verify dashboard statistics and graphical data accurately reflect backend data

title: Admin Panel - User and Agency Management
description: Verify that administrators can view, add, edit, and disable users and agencies and that changes persist and update immediately.

steps.description: Login as an admin user
Navigate to user management panel
Add a new user with valid details
Confirm user is added and appears in the list immediately
Edit an existing user's details
Verify updated details persist and display correctly
Deactivate a user and confirm status change
Navigate to agency management and perform add/edit operations similarly
Verify agency changes are persisted and accurately reflected in UI

title: Team Management - Agent Invitation Flow
description: Validate that agents can invite others securely, that invitations are delivered, and invitees can accept to join teams.

steps.description: Login as an agent and open team management module
Send an invitation to another agent's email with a secure invite link
Verify that invitation email is sent and recorded
As the invited agent, accept the invitation from the received link
Check that team membership updates for both the inviter and invitee

title: Settings & Preferences Update
description: Test that users can update notification, security, and general settings and that changes apply appropriately.

steps.description: Login as any user
Navigate to the settings and preferences page
Modify notification preferences and security settings
Save the settings
Verify settings are saved and apply immediately according to user preferences

title: Notification System - Push and In-App Notifications
description: Verify that push and in-app notifications are delivered timely, respect user preferences, and can be managed/subscribed/unsubscribed correctly.

steps.description: Login and ensure notifications are enabled in user preferences
Trigger typical notification events (e.g., new message, meeting reminder)
Confirm notifications appear in-app and as push notifications if subscribed
Change notification subscription settings to disable push notifications
Verify push notifications are no longer received but in-app continue as normal

title: Meeting Scheduling and Editing with Calendar Integration
description: Validate agents can schedule, edit, and delete meetings using forms and ensure synchronization with calendar components.

steps.description: Login as an agent and navigate to meeting management
Schedule a new meeting filling valid form data
Confirm meeting is added and shown on calendar interface
Edit the meeting details
Verify updates reflect on the calendar
Delete the meeting
Check the meeting is removed from calendar and meeting list

title: Property Sharing Workflow
description: Test that agents can share property details via modal dialogs and API integration, and recipients receive correct shared information.

steps.description: Login as an agent and select a property to share
Open the share property modal and enter recipient details
Submit the share form
Verify confirmation of successful share
Check recipient receives property information as expected

title: Form Validation Using Zod Schemas Across Modules
description: Ensure that all user input forms for properties, customers, meetings, sharing, and preferences strictly enforce validation rules via Zod schemas.

steps.description: Attempt to submit forms across the system with invalid, missing, or malformed data for each module
Verify validation errors are shown preventing submission
Submit forms with valid data
Confirm successful form submission and expected data processing

title: API Integration Error Handling and Response Validation
description: Test the centralized API layer's behavior when receiving various errors such as network failure, unauthorized access, and invalid data responses.

steps.description: Simulate failed API calls including network timeout, 401 Unauthorized, and 400 Bad Request responses
Verify frontend handles errors gracefully with user-friendly messages and no crashes
Confirm retry mechanisms or redirects function correctly where applicable

title: Cross-Browser Compatibility and Responsive UI
description: Verify the application renders and functions correctly across major browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) and on various screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile).

steps.description: Open application in each supported browser on desktop
Check all UI components render correctly without layout issues
Use responsive mode or actual devices for tablet and mobile screen sizes
Verify UI adapts appropriately to screen size with navigation and components accessible

title: Reusability and Functionality of Common UI Components
description: Test common UI components such as forms, modals, pagination, and search inputs to ensure consistent behavior and reusability across the application.

steps.description: Access different modules using common components (e.g., open modals in property and customer modules)
Verify common components behave consistently and integrate smoothly
Test pagination and search input behavior on large data sets
Confirm expected results and performance
